data.title: Assume that this group is someone else who want to verify the data signature with your public address
Assume you want to sign a data with an address that exist on your browser extension

Polkadot.js/Extension/Get/Signer.comment: This node will create a Signer object for your address on your extension

Input/UI/TextBox.comment: Paste your wallet address here. This will not work if you don't have this wallet address on your extension.

Polkadot.js/Data/Sign.comment: You will be asked by your extension to sign the data

Polkadot.js/Data/Verify.comment: Verify if the signature for the data is from your wallet's public key (address)

Console/GetReference.comment: Put cable to this node to view it's value on  your DevTools

Input/UI/Button.comment: Click the button to open your extension for signing data
